title: 543-544: 'The Death of the Hero! A Shocking Truth of Tiger!' and 'The Sun Pirates Split! Jimbei vs. Arlong!'
author: Never Watched One Piece
description: A detailed analysis and review of episodes 543-544 covering Fisher Tiger's death and its aftermath. The blogger praises Oda's nuanced moral storytelling where every faction has legitimate grievances. Rated '10/10 would watch again'.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains spoilers for episodes 543-544 of the Fish-Man Island flashback

title: The Going Merry: A One Piece Review Podcast - Episodes 543-547: Straight Man Propaganda
author: The Going Merry Podcast
description: Podcast review covering episodes 543-547, discussing how Fisher Tiger and Queen Otohime both fought to end prejudice between fish-men and humans in their own separate ways.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Discusses episodes 543-547 including Fisher Tiger's death and Otohime's story

title: One Piece, 543-545
author: Unknown Podcast
description: Podcast episode covering One Piece episodes 543-545, focusing on what happened with Fisher Tiger and the little girl Koala.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers the Fisher Tiger and Koala storyline through episode 545

title: One Piece: The Heroic Tale of Fisher Tiger
author: Game Rant
description: Character analysis article exploring Fisher Tiger's backstory, his raid on Mary Geoise, his philosophy on human-fish-man relations, and the themes his character represents including systemic racism, slavery, and the struggle for freedom.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Full character analysis including Fisher Tiger's death

title: One Piece: The Split of the Sun Pirates, Explained
author: Game Rant
description: Article explaining the events leading to the Sun Pirates' split after Fisher Tiger's death, including the different paths taken by Jinbe and Arlong.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Covers Fisher Tiger's death and the Sun Pirates splitting

title: After 14 Years, Eiichiro Oda Brings Back A Legendary Pirate In One Piece
author: Game Rant
description: Article discussing the revelation in Chapter 1167 that Shanks was the one who helped Fisher Tiger escape from Mary Geoise, adding new context to Tiger's backstory seen in episode 543.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains major spoilers from Chapter 1167 revealing Shanks' involvement in Fisher Tiger's escape

title: One Piece: Who are the Sun Pirates and Where are They Now?
author: CBR
description: Comprehensive article about the Sun Pirates crew, their formation under Fisher Tiger, major members, and what happened to the crew after Tiger's death in episode 543.

spoilerWarning.spoilerDescription: Contains information about Sun Pirates throughout the series including current whereabouts

title: One Piece Episode 543: The Hero's Last Moments! The Impact of Tiger's Truth
author: FanVerse Community
description: Forum discussion thread from when episode 543 originally aired, with fans sharing their emotional reactions to Fisher Tiger's death. One user noted 'It started getting hard to watch when Tiger started crying.'
